title: Lower priced FontFont Collection: Tastier than a free lunch.
content:
Submitted by [Joe Pemberton](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203182803/http:/www.typophile.com/user/1160 "View user profile.") : 18.Nov.2003 8.20pm 

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203182803im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/72/20768.gif)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203182803im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/72/20769.jpg)   
   
**Fulfill your fine font craving with a FontFont Library CD**   
   
FSI FontShop International has lowered the price on the   
FontFont Library, giving struggling design firms what they   
need during hard times: more affordable font licensing.   
   
Do the math:   
$12,900 / 2,442 typefaces = $5.28 per typeface.   
$5.28 per typeface / 20 CPUs = 26 cents per typeface, per user.   
   
The new FF Library CD includes the entire FontFont Library
author: Joe Pemberton
